channel.title: [614] Npc Attack ::tele
channel.description:
Hello, i have a 614 server (Spawnscape) im coding but i got a problem my ::tele command dosnt work either my ::npc command..
1. I spawned a npc from server files but i can't attack it its popping up "NPC attacked index:5 "
would be awesome if someone helped me :)
-Leo

item.title: [614] Npc Attack ::tele
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I need the full commands, you aren’t giving me the whole thing…

Read full topic

item.title: [614] Npc Attack ::tele
item.dc:creator: @Innovationx24-7 Innovationx24-7
item.description:
@Innovationx24-7 wrote:

/* } else if (cmd[0].equals("npc")) { String[] names = {"damngirl", "h_p", "dulek", "co_pure_gs", "tester_kai", "tester_h_p"}; boolean canContinue = false; for(String d : names) { if(d.equalsIgnoreCase(p.getUsername())) { canContinue = true; break; } } if(!canContinue) { p.getFrames().sendChatMessage(0, "You are currently unable to do this."); return; } World.getNpcs().add(new Npc((short) Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), p.getLocation(), 0, 0, 0, 0));*/
